sections.content:
# NSIP Architecture

This document describes the architecture of the NSIP (Nationally Significant Infrastructure Projects) software system including:

- Front-Office Applications
- Back-Office Applications
- Operational Data Warehouse
- Horizon (Legacy System)

people.description: Member of PINS staff who administers project information
people.name: Case worker

people.description: Member of PINS staff who manages case workers
people.name: Case manager

people.description: Member of PINS Inspector staff who decides cases
people.name: Inspector

people.description: Member of PINS staff who can trigger a case migration
people.name: Migration Admin

containers.description: (application-service-uploads) - Azure Blob Storage Container that contains all documents and document versions in CBOS
containers.name: CBOS File storage

relationships.description: MS Defender sends result of document malware scan
MS Defender sends result of document malware scan

containers.description: (published-documents) - Azure Blob Storage Container that contains all Published documents, also accessible by Front Office
containers.name: Published File storage

containers.description: (application-submission-documents) - Azure Blob Storage Container that contains documents submitted from Front Office, also accessible by CBOS
containers.name: Front Office Submissions File storage

containers.description: Back-office website used to manage cases
containers.name: CBOS Web

relationships.description: Renders page, gets and posts data using

containers.description: CBOS API to perform CRUD operations on NSIP cases, documents, S51 Advice, Relevant Representations, Exam Timetables etc, on the database, and broadcast events to the Azure Service Bus
containers.name: Web CBOS API

relationships.description: Reads and writes case data to
Reads and writes applications documents to

containers.description: Source of truth for cases, built and maintained from model using Prisma
containers.name: Database

components.description: Process written submissions from the Front Office
components.name: Process Front Office Deadine Submissions

relationships.description: Reads documents submitted via Front Office
Writes documents submitted via Front Office into CBOS

components.description: Process written submissions from the Front Office
components.name: Force Test a Deadine Submission

relationships.description: Broadcast a test Deadline Submission message

components.description: Process Email Subscription Updates from Front Office
components.name: Process Front Office Subscriptions

relationships.description: Creates and updates email subscription records

components.description: Process Relevant Representatios from Front Office
components.name: Process Relevant Representations

containers.description: Function App to receive commands from Front Office
containers.name: Command Handler Function App

relationships.description: Reads documents submitted via Front Office
Writes documents submitted via Front Office into CBOS

components.description: Publish a document to Front Office
components.name: Publish Document

relationships.description: Reads and updates applications documents records

components.description: Unpublish a document from Front Office
components.name: Unpublish Document

relationships.description: Reads and updates applications documents records

components.description: Send an Email to Subscribers via Gov Notify
components.name: Send Email to Subscribers

relationships.description: Reads and updates subscription and project records

components.description: Updates Malware status of documents to CBOS
components.name: Updates document Malware Scan Status

relationships.description: Updates applications documents records malware check status

containers.description: Function App to receive commands from CBOS
containers.name: Background Jobs Function App

relationships.description: Reads and updates subscription and project records

components.description: Migrate General S51 Advice from Horizon
components.name: Migrate General S51 Advice

components.description: Migrate whole case and all component parts - Exam Timetable, Folders, Documents, S51 Advice, Relevant Representations, Project Updates and Service Users from Horizon
components.name: Migrate Case

components.description: Migrate Case data only from Horizon
components.name: Migrate Project

components.description: Migrate exam timetable records from Horizon
components.name: Migrate Exam Timetable

components.description: Migrate S51 Advice on a case from Horizon
components.name: Migrate S51 Advice on a case

containers.description: Function App to process migrated case and document data from Horizon
containers.name: Migration Function App
containers.technology: Function App, JavaScript, Azure SQL, Prisma, SynapseDB

softwareSystems.description: Internally facing service allowing for management of cases relating to Nationally Significant Infrastructure Projects (NSIPs) within England and Wales
softwareSystems.name: CBOS - Casework Back-Office System

softwareSystems.description: External facing service providing ability to participate in the application process for Nationally Significant Infrastructure Projects (NSIPs) within England and Wales
softwareSystems.name: Applications Front-Office
softwareSystems.tags: Element,Software System,Node.js,Azure Web App,Azure Function App,InternalCollaboratorSystem

softwareSystems.description: Holds all Planning Inspectorate data so that it can be used for internal purposes
softwareSystems.name: Operational Data Warehouse (ODW)
softwareSystems.tags: Element,Software System,Microsoft Azure - Azure Synapse Analytics,InternalCollaboratorSystem

softwareSystems.description: UK government messaging platform for sending emails, text and letters to users
softwareSystems.name: GOV Notify

containerViews.description: Shows the containers within the Applications Front-Office system. Go to the next view to see the rest.
containerViews.title: Applications Back-Office Container

containerViews.description: Shows the function apps within the Applications Back-Office system CBOS - these are responsible for consuming messages from the Service Bus and updating the Azure SQL database.
containerViews.title: Applications Back-Office Function Apps
